ErrorfreeArithmetic.jl

  • Readme

    Docstrings
    ErrorfreeArithmetic.ErrorfreeArithmetic
    ErrorfreeArithmetic.eval
    ErrorfreeArithmetic.include
    ErrorfreeArithmetic.three_cube — Function.
    three_cube(a)

    Computes s = fl(a*a*a) and e1 = err(a*a*a), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.three_diff — Function.
    three_diff(a, b, c)

    Computes s = fl(a-b-c) and e1 = err(a-b-c), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.three_fma — Function.

    three_fma(a, b, c)

    Computes s = fl(fma(a,b,c)) and e1 = err(fma(a,b,c)), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.three_hilo_diff — Function.
    three_hilo_diff(a, b, c)

    unchecked requirement |a| ≥ |b| ≥ |c|

    Computes s = fl(a-b-c) and e1 = err(a-b-c), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.three_hilo_sum — Function.
    three_hilo_sum(a, b, c)

    unchecked requirement |a| ≥ |b| ≥ |c|

    Computes s = fl(a+b+c) and e1 = err(a+b+c), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.three_lohi_diff — Function.
    three_lohi_diff(a, b, c)

    unchecked requirement |c| ≥ |b| ≥ |a|

    Computes s = fl(a-b-c) and e1 = err(a-b-c), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.three_lohi_sum — Function.
    three_lohi_sum(a, b, c)

    unchecked requirement |c| ≥ |b| ≥ |a|

    Computes s = fl(a+b+c) and e1 = err(a+b+c), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.three_prod — Function.
    three_prod(a, b, c)

    Computes s = fl(a*b*c) and e1 = err(a*b*c), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.three_sum — Function.
    three_sum(a, b, c)

    Computes s = fl(a+b+c) and e1 = err(a+b+c), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_cube — Function.
    two_cube(a)

    Computes s = fl(a*a*a) and e1 = err(a*a*a), e2 = err(e1).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_diff — Function.
    two_diff(a, b)

    Computes s = fl(a-b) and e = err(a-b).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_div
    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_hilo_diff — Function.
    two_hilo_diff(a, b)

    unchecked requirement |a| ≥ |b|

    Computes s = fl(a-b) and e = err(a-b).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_hilo_sum — Function.
    two_hilo_sum(a, b)

    unchecked requirement |a| ≥ |b|

    Computes s = fl(a+b) and e = err(a+b).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_inv
    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_lohi_diff — Function.
    two_lohi_diff(a, b)

    unchecked requirement |b| ≥ |a|

    Computes s = fl(a-b) and e = err(a-b).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_lohi_sum — Function.
    two_lohi_sum(a, b)

    unchecked requirement |b| ≥ |a|

    Computes s = fl(a+b) and e = err(a+b).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_prod — Function.
    two_prod(a, b)

    Computes s = fl(a*b) and e = err(a*b).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_sqrt
    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_square — Function.
    two_square(a)

    Computes s = fl(a*a) and e = err(a*a).

    ErrorfreeArithmetic.two_sum — Function.
    two_sum(a, b)

    Computes s = fl(a+b) and e = err(a+b).
